data.name: Shocked
data.detailed_description:
This game is heavily inspired by the inFAMOUS series made by Sucker Punch. You play as a character named "Bel" who works as an animator. You control electricity. Play around with this interesting experience! You can go through and fight some other people with powers, and fly through the city using Electric powers! (THIS IS NOT A FULL GAME JUST AN EXPERIENCE)

In this game, you end up gaining more powers to do more incredible things as the game progresses, such as jump-boosting, shooting electricity, or calling down lightning from the sky to fry your enemies to a crisp! You also can parkour around the city, or just mess around with your powers! You were given powers from a testing chamber, and now you get to decide their fate, which could have disastrous consequences depending on the decision. This game will be constantly updated with even more stuff to come, such as a Multiplayer DLC, and a story expansion. However, as of right now, I am just focusing on getting the game released, that of which I have no clue of a release date for.

This game is a self-worked project, made with Unreal Engine 4.27, for those interested!

data.short_description: Control electricity in this inFAMOUS-inspired game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X 8-Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 Super
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Default PC Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: I am unaware of the minimum specs to run the game as I have only tested it on my game, and do not know some of these. Please check constantly as I get an updated idea of these stats.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X 8-Core Processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 Super
  • Sound Card: Default PC Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: I am unaware of the minimum specs to run the game as I have only tested it on my game, and do not know some of these. Please check constantly as I get an updated idea of these stats.
